page.title: 14A DAY WITH LARA CROAN.
page.content: My name is LARISSA CROAN .My friends call me LARA for short.In the morning my mum is up very early to take my older sister GILL to the railway station where she will catch a train to Glasgow where she works.GUY my boxer /type dog follows mum upstairs and he bounds playfully onto my bed.I climb out of bed and enter the shower/room for a quick wash before breakfast.I also remember to dunk my brace into water.The brace is to keep my teeth straight as they are developing.I dress putting on my underskirt, skirt,blouse tie and jersey.I then enter the dining /area where I pour myself tea and eat some white bread with chocolate spread on it.I put my shoes on brush my hair kiss my dog and mum good/bye and set off for a busy day at the halls of learning.
